trans-unit.source: Defines the serialization context for WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: Define o contexto de serialização para mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: A container for objects used to serialize WS-Trust requests (RST) and responses (RSTR).
trans-unit.target: Um contêiner para objetos usados para serializar a solicitações do WS-Trust (primeira) e respostas (RSTR).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> que contém o conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> a ser usado para serializar e validar os tokens encontrados em mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> com o objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> que contém o conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> a ser usado para serializar e validar os tokens encontrados em mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object to use to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> a ser usado para resolver as referências de token de segurança encontradas na maioria dos elementos de mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object to use to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> a ser usado para resolver as referências de token de segurança encontradas no elemento wst:UseKey das mensagens RST, bem como no elemento wst:RenewTarget encontrado em mensagens RST.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />, and <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> com os objetos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> e <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenResolver" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityTokenResolver" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="useKeyTokenResolver" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="useKeyTokenResolver" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects used for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> que contém o conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> usados para serializar e validar os tokens encontrados em mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects used to serialize and validate security tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> usados para serializar e validar os tokens de segurança encontrados em mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object used to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> usado para resolver as referências de token de segurança encontradas na maioria dos elementos de mensagens WS-Trust.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object used to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> usado para resolver as referências de token de segurança encontradas no elemento wst:UseKey das mensagens RST, bem como no elemento wst:RenewTarget encontrado em mensagens RST.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />.
